thread.title: boutique hotel with fabulous amenities and superb location
thread.title_full: boutique hotel with fabulous amenities and superb location - Review of Grand Pigalle Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: J D
title: boutique hotel with fabulous amenities and superb location
text: Grand Pigalle is a fabulous boutiqute hotel. lovely amenities, great views and the perfect amount of charm. it is located off the beaten path of the touristy areas, so if youre looking for what it's like to be a native Parisian, this is your place. cute little store around the area with great taste and charm. the restaurant is delicious as well.
